title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and cheese.
Cook bacon until crispy, then add cooked spaghetti to the pan.
Remove from heat and quickly mix in the egg mixture.
Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or bake the chicken until cooked through.
In a pan, melt butter and sauté garlic and ginger.
Add tomato puree and cook for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and simmer for another 10 minutes.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce and cook for 5 more minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir fry with a mix of fresh vegetables and a savory sauce.
instructions: Heat oil in a wok or skillet and sauté garlic and ginger.
Add vegetables and stir fry for 4-5 minutes until crisp-tender.
Stir in soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil.
Season with salt and pepper, then serve with rice or noodles.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Crispy taco shells filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: Cook ground beef in a skillet over medium heat until browned.
Add taco seasoning and simmer with water according to package instructions.
Warm taco shells in the oven.
Fill shells with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, and salsa.
Garnish with cilantro and serve.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: A fresh salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, and Caesar dressing.
instructions: Combine lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan in a bowl.
Drizzle with Caesar dressing and toss.
Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Classic cookies loaded with chocolate chips, perfect for a sweet treat.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Cream together butter and sugars.
Beat in eggs and vanilla.
Mix in flour, baking soda, and salt.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Scoop onto baking tray and bake 10-12 minutes.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: A simple yet delicious pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
Roll out pizza dough and spread with tomato sauce.
Top with mozzarella and tomato slices.
Bake 10-12 minutes until crust is golden.
Garnish with basil and drizzle with olive oil.

title: Grilled Salmon
summary: Perfectly grilled salmon fillets served with a side of lemon and herbs.
instructions: Season salmon with salt, pepper, and olive oil.
Grill skin side down for 4-5 minutes per side.
Serve with lemon slices and fresh herbs.

title: Pancakes
summary: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh berries.
ingredients: Maple syrup and berries for serving
instructions: Mix dry ingredients in one bowl, wet ingredients in another.
Combine and whisk until smooth.
Pour batter onto a greased pan and cook until golden.
Serve with maple syrup and berries.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing salad with cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and a tangy dressing.
instructions: Combine cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta in a bowl.
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Pour dressing over salad and toss to coat.

title: Lentil Soup
summary: A hearty and nutritious soup made with lentils, vegetables, and spices.
instructions: Sauté onion, carrots, celery, and garlic until softened.
Add lentils, spices, and broth.
Simmer 30-40 minutes until lentils are tender.
Season with salt and pepper before serving.

title: Apple Pie
summary: A classic dessert with a flaky crust and a sweet apple filling.
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Mix apples with sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon juice.
Fill crust with apple mixture, cover with top crust.
Bake 45-50 minutes until golden brown.
